SELECT B.* FROM (SELECT ROWNUM RNUM, A.* FROM(SELECT POST_NUM, POST_CATE_NUM, BLOGER_ID, CASE WHEN LENGTH(POST_TITLE) <= '10' THEN POST_TITLE WHEN LENGTH(POST_TITLE) > '10' THEN SUBSTR(POST_TITLE, 0,10)||' ...' END AS POST_TITLE, POST_CONTENT, POST_VIEW, POST_HEART, TO_CHAR(POST_DATE,'YYYY.mm.dd HH24:MI') AS POST_DATE, POST_TAG, THUMNAIL FROM TB_BLOG_POST
ORDER BY POST_DATE DESC ) A ) B WHERE RNUM BETWEEN #{startRow} AND #{endRow}
